title: Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: The process of updating the checked state of the table takes a long time (around 30 seconds in my case). During this time, a Busy cursor should be shown to indicate that the process is ongoing. Currently, there is no indication of the process being busy.
OB: When updating the checked state of the table, it takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds) to complete. However, there is no visual indication such as a Busy cursor to show that the process is ongoing.
EB: When updating the checked state of the table, it takes a long time (around 30 seconds) to complete. During this time, a Busy cursor should be shown to indicate the ongoing process.
SR:
1. Open the application and navigate to the table where the checkbox state needs to be updated.
2. Start the process of updating the checkbox state.
3. Observe that it takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds) to complete.
4. Verify that there is no Busy cursor shown during the process.
5. Expectedly, a Busy cursor should be displayed to indicate the ongoing process of updating the checkbox state.
